resources.string: Yerevan is the capital city of Armenia. It is one of the oldest cities in the world, having a beautiful heritage.
Bangkok, Thailandâ€™s capital, is a large city known for ornate shrines and vibrant street life.
Rome is the capital city of Italy. It is also the capital of the Lazio region, the centre of the Metropolitan City of Rome, and a special comune named Comune di Roma Capitale.
